env.info: (hold 10) (plate 0) (at 0 4) (sort 1 couch) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 bed) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (sort 3 table) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (sort 4 desk) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (sort 5 washmachine) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (type 5 container) (closed 5) (sort 6 refrigerator) (size 6 big) (at 6 6) (type 6 container) (closed 6) (sort 8 book) (size 8 small) (color 8 red) (sort 9 book) (size 9 small) (color 9 blue) (inside 9 6) (sort 10 book) (size 10 small) (color 10 green) (sort 11 cup) (size 11 small) (color 11 red) (sort 12 cup) (size 12 small) (color 12 blue) (sort 13 cup) (size 13 small) (color 13 green) (at 13 3) (sort 14 can) (size 14 small) (color 14 white) (sort 15 can) (size 15 small) (color 15 black) (at 15 1)

test.instr: (:ins (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X table)))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X desk)))) (:cons_not (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X red) (sort Y washmachine)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (plate X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X green)))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X book))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (sort Y couch))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y bed))) )
test.nl: Do not go to the table. Do not go to the desk. Do not take out red book from washmachine. The green book must be in the plate. Pick up a book. Put a cup on the couch. Put a can on bed.
